parameters.name: CollapseType
parameters.description: Type of item to collapse as defined in swBOMTableObjectType_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Row index; valid only if CollapseType is swBOMTableObjectType_e.swBOMTableObjectType_RowIndex

title: IBomTableAnnotation.Collapse
signature:
void Collapse( 
   System.Int32
CollapseType
,
   System.Int32
Index
)

parameters.name: CollapseType
parameters.description: Type of item to collapse as defined in swBOMTableObjectType_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Row index; valid only if CollapseType is swBOMTableObjectType_e.swBOMTableObjectType_RowIndex

remarks: If CollapseType is swBOMTableObjectType_e.swBOMTableObjectType_CutList, then all cut lists in the table collapse.

examples.title: Expand, Collapse, and Dissolve a Subassembly in a BOM Table (VBA)
Expand, Collapse, and Dissolve a Subassembly in a BOM Table (VB.NET)
Expand, Collapse, and Dissolve a Subassembly in a BOM Table (C#)
